title: Mobills: Budget Planner
summary: Create a budget, track your spending, and manage your money in one place.

comments: It is costly. Only two budget entry is available. 155 php per month is too much a cost for an app that tracks money. I would opt to use excel and make all the formulas to balance check everything for free. Thanks anyway.

Good app in free version, but after going to premium I'm not happy. One of the main reasons for premium is to use the filter by tag in order to calculate some expenses, but this filter is always missing some items. No matter how many times I edit the missing itens and re-search, it is always missing some and not closing the math. For a finance application, not doing math right is a totally no go.

This is not user friendly at all. No instructions, no step by step, and I don't have time to go back and forth on an email. you should add a guide/instructions,  something to help your users out like other budget apps.

I have trialed a few of these and this one is by far the simplest to understand and use. I love the budget function so you can track how much you are spending on certain things outside of your normal bills. Intuitive to use although it is the 'recurring' expense you want to use for monthly bills, not repeat. Great app. Love it.
The app crashed when trying to export a CSV report. PDF and XLS options don't seem to work at all.
Easy to use once you poke around and see what's where. Nice colors, not intimidating to use. Not as scared to look at my Bills now LOL
